item.title: CLS Holdings USA Inc 10-K
item.description: CLS Holdings USA Inc, which is in the Retail-Miscellaneous Retail [5900] industry, SEC 10-K filing on August 25, 2022 had 44832 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: cannabis - 702 instances may - 596 instances company - 593 instances 31 - 370 instances 2022 - 324 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
